experience.description: Developed and implemented comprehensive lesson plans for 11th-grade English Language Arts, aligning curriculum with state standards and facilitating classroom discussions for diverse student populations.
Assisted lead teachers in classroom management and small-group instruction, provided individualized support to students with IEPs, and contributed to the development of digital learning modules.
Delivered specialized instruction in Mathematics and Science to high school students, resulting in an average grade improvement of one letter grade for regular attendees.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
